name: Isotope Visual Layouts lite
upgrade_notice: Added WP Caching which helps improve performance, fixed a potentially major plugin conflict and rewrote WP_query.
author: Damien Saunders

sections.description: Add visual effects to your list of posts & custom post types using Isotope. Needs a responsive theme.
sections.installation_notes: Click install to download and automatically update to the new version..
sections.changelog:
Changelog.

This section list's what's changed.

  • 2.0
    • Added WP Query Transient Cache
    • Fixed potential plugin conflict
    • Rewrote Query as WP_Query was Get Posts
      • 1.0 - First Release. 7 Colour themes and 3 styles
